description.message: HiveCapture :: CSV File Screen Capture Tool

timeout.message:
A timeout error occurs when capturing $nth$ th URL.
Please try again.

firstInvalid.message:
Sorry, the first URL could not be found.
Please try again.

erorrRedirect.message:
Unfortunately, the process has been terminated due to 404 error occured capturing the $nth$ th URL.
It will proceed to result page.

zipConfirm.message:
As you proceed zip file download, the file from the server will be removed.
Would you like to proceed?
